QuestData.Title: News from Zangarmarsh
QuestData.Description: Shadow Hunter Denjai isn't the only one expecting a report from me. Mokasa at Stonebreaker Hold in Terokkar is eager to hear of our progress, especially since most of her messengers travel through here.$B$BShe asked me to send word once Swamprat Post was completed. If you wouldn't mind delivering the news, I'd be very grateful. We may be up and running, but there is still much to be done.$B$BTo get to Stonebreaker Hold, follow the road south out of Zangarmarsh, into Terokkar Forest and beyond Tuurem.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Mokasa at Stonebreaker Hold in Terokkar Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: It's about time he got that outpost up and running. We've lost far too many runners to Alliance outriders.
